mechanoreception.notes: Sensory capabilities related to detecting physical stimuli (e.g., water currents, substrate vibrations). Further research needed to ascertain the prevalence and specifics within Barentsiidae.

chemoreception.notes: Sensory capabilities related to detecting chemical stimuli in the environment. Further research is required to determine the extent of chemoreception in Barentsiidae.

photoreception.notes: Sensory capabilities related to detecting light. The presence or absence of photoreceptors and light sensitivity in Barentsiidae is currently unknown.
